Live Watch CBSN Live Minnesota Governor Tim Walz announced Sunday night that state Attorney General Keith Ellison will lead any prosecutions related to George Floyd’s death. “It is with a great degree of humility and great seriousness that I accept the responsibility for leadership on this critical case,” Ellison said.
